div.p: HERE IT IS, YOUR MOMENT OF ZEN.
>> I THINK THE AMERICAN PEOPLE SHOULD NOT ONLY SEE THE PICTURE,
NOT ONLY SEE THE BODY BEING TOSSED OFF, AND I AGREE WITH SENATOR GRAHAM, I THINK WE NEED
TO SEE THE FOOTAGE OF THE OPERATION.
>> THEY HAD TO OBSERVE MUSLIM CUSTOM.
>> I DON'T THINK, GRETCHEN, THAT OSAMA BIN LADEN LIVED THE TYPICAL MUSLIM LIFE.
>> WELL, A LOT OF CHRISTIANS DON'TCAPTIONING SPONSORED BY COMEDY CENTRAL CAPTIONED BY
MEDIA ACCESS GROUP AT WGBH ACCESS.WG
